message: Let's start with a reasonable offer, Bob. I believe this split is fair considering the decreasing value over time.
I'm willing to split the money 60/40 in my favor. This is a fairer split considering your money depreciates faster. Let's end this quickly and avoid further loss.
Bob, I understand your position, but your offer significantly undervalues my position in the early rounds. Let's settle this fairly - I'm willing to meet you closer to the middle ground.
